sentences.sContent: Jiro waddled closer, his belly bulging and distended.
sentences.sCn: 吉罗大腹便便地蹒跚而来。

words.tran: 生球茎；膨胀成球状（bulb的过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 膨胀， 鼓起 curve outward)
trans.tranOther: to stick out in a rounded shape, especially because something is very full or too tight
a curved mass on the surface of something, usually caused by something under or inside it
